text:
So happy to stay at a 5-star hotel in Singapore!
Walking into the hotel felt like stepping into an art galleryâ€”so many artsy pieces displayed in the lobby, it was such a vibe.

Hi to Kishern, the friendly receptions!

Room
The room was spacious, cozy, and aesthetically pleasing. It had complete amenities, and the complimentary coffee and tea were refilled daily. They even provided TWG tea as a complimentary treat! The bathrobe was also unique and stylish.

Facilities
Loved the rooftop swimming poolâ€”amazing views of the Singapore Flyer and Esplanade. Itâ€™s the perfect spot for photos and chilling in the evening. Big thanks to Thatcha from the Naumi Bar staff who kindly helped take some great photos!

Location
Perfect! Super close to Chijmes, Bras Basah Complex, Bugis, and Orchard.

Overall my experience was very good for 8 nights business trip, very practical hotel and well located near one of the biggest convention centers in Singapore, also, it is surrounded by several dining options as the hotel doesnâ€™t have any dining options other than the basic breakfast in the morning, so you need to set your expectations carefully before booking and based on the purpose of your trip. My room was excellent as I believe it was upgraded. Hotel is clean and smells well. A very tiny gym that was a bit of disappointment but at least you have the chance to exercise. Staff is very helpful and responsive.

A truly lovely hotel with friendly staff and a stunning pool. Some of the reviews for this hotel seem very misaligned with our experience.

Rooms clean and very comfortable the pool/bar area has an excellent view across Raffels/CBD and as a first time visitor the locations could not have been better to explore.

We traveled from London for 4 nights and felt the quality exceeded expectations for the price (we did opt for a larger room) I wonder if people are comparing the price to other south East Asian cities - which is fruitless.

Everyone who severed us was so kind a smiley estate happy hour and at the front desk.

Hope to return ðŸ™‚

Comfortable room and great location, making it a convenient stay. The bed was decent, and amenities were sufficient. However, the TV only offers local channels with no Netflix, which could be improved for better entertainment options.

Quiet hotel overall okish but far far from what you have in mind when you book a five stars hotel, this can be a three stars hotel maximum compared to European standards!
Small infinity pool is very good to refresh and cool down after one day spent out in the city.
